ad345475-262c-4f2e-8fa5-dbef75e09810.name: Business Application Tier Performance
ad345475-262c-4f2e-8fa5-dbef75e09810.description:
Key Performance Indicator (%) of a Tier. A business application is made up of tiers, which in turn have VMs.

Limitation: a business app must have 2 and 2 levels only. Biz App --> Tier --> VM.

For details, see VCF Operations Transformation book and vSphere Metrics book, which are parts of Operationalize Your World.
